text: Aguirre, the Wrath of God (; ) is a 1972 German-Mexican-Peruvian historical drama movie directed by Werner Herzog and starring Klaus Kinski, Helena Rojo, Ruy Guerra, Del Negro, Peter Berling. ==Other websites== * * Category:1972 drama movies Category:1970s historical movies Category:German drama movies Category:German biographical movies Category:Mexican biographical movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Peruvian movies Category:Movies directed by Werner Herzog Category:Movies set in Peru Category:Movies set in the 16th century Category:Movies about death Category:1970s biographical movies Category:Movies based on real life events Category:German-language movies
title: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
